data.message:
Bummer... when I heard Facebook was creating a Search Engine I thought it was a legitimate one that would hold up to Google... not some form of a Dating Survey. Facebook... you're an idiot! (...growl...)  ...stocks went into the Red when you made your announcement!!!  Create a Real Search Engine and the Advertisers will be knocking down doors to be on your site.

This Is What Facebook Graph Search Looks Like
www.businessinsider.com
